description:
Join alien pest control specialist (and possibly shortest mercenary in the galaxy) Bax Torpini, as he fights to rid Stalwart Academy, a school space station, of a rogue horde of out-of-control robot space monsters!

-Top-down twin-stick shooter game!

-Classic arcade shoot-'em-up action, with 8 levels, 2 bonus levels, 9 weapons and 3 alt fires

-Quickly swap weapons as often as you want using the 'GunMod pad' system!

-Special hidden 'Bax Card' art card collectibles throughout the game, each illustrated by a different indie artist
name: GUNPIG: Firepower For Hire
